title: Dance at Bryant Park
short_description: Come and enjoy an awesome Dance Party with music by superb bands and expert dance instruction, each Wednesday evening in May and June.
more_content: Come and enjoy an awesome Dance Party with music by superb bands and expert dance instruction, each Wednesday evening in May and June. All-ages are welcome to explore a different dance genre each week, including swing, tango, salsa, bachata and more. The event is absolutely free the only thing you need to bring is your great mood and a pair of comfy shoes.
